article.title: General Dynamics European Land Systems Awarded Contract for EAGLE IV 4x4 Vehicles for Germany
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics European Land Systems as entered a contract with Bundesamt f√ºr Wehrtechnik und Beschaffung, a German company, for the delivery of 198 EAGLE IV protected command and function vehicles. The contract has a total value of approximately $141 million.
